BaseTemplate.description: An automated AI trading bot for stocks and crypto

Index.meta_description: Smartvest Bot is your intelligent trading companion, leveraging AI to optimize your stock and crypto investments.

Portfolio.meta_description: View your active trades and portfolio performance
Portfolio.presentation: Your personalized trading portfolio showcases your active positions, historical performance, and AI-generated insights. Track your investments and monitor your bot's trading strategies in real-time.

About.meta_description: Learn about our AI-powered trading technology
About.about_paragraph: Welcome to Smartvest Bot! We're pioneering the future of automated trading with advanced AI algorithms designed to optimize your investment strategy across both stock and crypto markets.

SignIn.meta_description: Access your AI trading dashboard securely

SignUp.meta_description: Start your automated trading journey today
